除天然含水量平均值为 $20.0\%$ ,比最优含水量( $18.7\%$ )高,其余各项指标均满足《水利水电天然建筑材料勘察规程》(SL251-2015)关于一般填筑土料和一般防渗土料质量要求,为合格土料。
structure.summary: This document outlines the dam construction materials and filling standards for a new homogeneous dam project. It specifies that heavy silty loam will be used as the primary construction material and provides a detailed comparison of its physical properties—such as clay content, plasticity index, permeability coefficient, moisture content, and dry density—against the quality requirements of the "Technical Code for Investigation of Natural Building Materials for Water Resources and Hydropower Projects" (SL251-2015). The document concludes that the soil is qualified for use as general filling and anti-seepage material, noting that while the natural moisture content is slightly higher than the optimal level, all other indicators meet the required standards.

structure.title: (2)填筑标准
structure.text:
# (2)填筑标准  

根据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》(SL274-2020)4.2.3,黏性土的压实度应符合下列要求:1 级坝、2 级坝和 3 级以下高坝的压实度不应低于 $98\%$ ;地震设计烈度为Ⅷ度、Ⅸ的坝,应在上述规定基础上相应提高。根据《平原水库设计规范》(DB37/T 1342-2021)8.3.18 要求:1 级坝、2 级坝的压实度应为 $98\%\sim100\%$ ,设计地震烈度为 8 度、9 度的地区,宜取上述规定的最大值。  

本工程设计地震烈度为度Ⅷ度,围坝土料填筑压实度取 $100\%$ 。
structure.summary: 该段文档主要说明了工程围坝土料填筑的压实标准。其依据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》和《平原水库设计规范》中关于坝体等级和地震烈度对压实度的要求，确定了在本工程Ⅷ度地震设计烈度下，围坝土料填筑的压实度标准为100%。

structure.title: 5.6.2.2 坝体构造
structure.text:
# 5.6.2.2 坝体构造  

(1)坝顶宽度  

本工程围坝为均质坝,坝顶宽度考虑满足坝体稳定、交通、布置、施工及运行管理的要求。根据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》(SL274-2020)规定,坝顶宽度应根据构造、施工、运行和抗震等因素确定,高坝的坝顶宽度可选用 $10{\sim}15\mathrm{m}$ ,中、低级坝可取 $5{\sim}10\mathrm{m}$ 。本工程围坝较长,坝顶宽度应满足防汛车辆巡视、错车的要求。综合考虑以上因素,本工程坝顶宽度取 $10.0\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary: This section of the document details the design specifications for the dam crest width of a homogeneous dam. It explains that the width was determined based on factors such as structural stability, traffic requirements, construction needs, and operational management. Referencing the "Design Code for Rolled Earth-Rock Fill Dams" (SL274-2020) and considering the necessity for flood control vehicle access and passing, the document specifies a final dam crest width of 10.0 meters.

structure.title: (2)坝顶交通
structure.text:
# (2)坝顶交通  

坝顶面上、下游侧设置混凝土路缘石,结合坝顶排水,路缘石每隔 $100\mathrm{m}$ 设置排水口和下游坝坡排水沟衔接;坝顶路面为沥青混凝土路面,宽 $8.8\mathsf{m}$ ,详见图 5.6.2-1,面层为 7cm 厚沥青混凝土,路面横坡 $2\%$ 向坝后侧,下层为 20cm 厚水泥稳定级配碎石,最底层为 15cm 厚水泥稳定土。  

![](images/48e3ec397070123e6ec185fc9e0439b1b03f3337dfd6ed4c08fc3a211a10a3e4.jpg)  
图 5.6.2-1 坝顶结构图
structure.summary: This document describes the design and structural specifications of dam crest transportation, detailing the drainage system (concrete curbs and outlets every 100m), road dimensions (8.8m width and a 2% cross-slope), and the multi-layer pavement composition consisting of asphalt concrete, cement-stabilized graded macadam, and cement-stabilized soil.

structure.title: (3)上、下游护坡
structure.text:
# (3)上、下游护坡  

围坝为均质土坝,采用库区开挖重粉质壤土筑坝,参照已有工程,上、下游坝坡坡比设为 1:3。为了防止波浪淘刷、顺坝水流冲刷、冻胀、漂浮物和冰层的撞击及冰冻的挤压,围坝迎水面设置抗冲护坡。为防止雨水、冻胀、干裂及蚁、鼠等动物破坏,围坝背水面亦应设置草皮护坡。护坡的形式、材料及构造根据坝的级别、风浪、气候等运用条件、当地材料情况、工期和造价等因素综合考虑,经技术经济比较确定。
structure.summary: 该文档片段主要介绍了围坝上、下游护坡的设计要求。核心内容包括：明确了均质土坝的材料及1:3的坝坡坡比；阐述了迎水面设置抗冲护坡以应对波浪、水流冲刷及冰冻影响的必要性；说明了背水面设置草皮护坡以防止雨水、干裂及生物破坏的功能；并指出护坡形式与材料的选择需综合考虑工程级别、环境条件、成本及工期等因素进行技术经济比选。

structure.title: 1)上游护坡
structure.summary: This document segment focuses on the selection and technical calculation of upstream slope protection for a dam. It introduces three proposed schemes—masonry, precast concrete blocks, and cast-in-place concrete—and provides a detailed engineering analysis of "Scheme 1: Masonry Slope Protection." The text outlines the mathematical formulas and specific parameters (such as stone density, slope ratio, and wave height) used to calculate the required average stone diameter ($D_{50}$) and stone weight ($Q_{50}$) necessary to withstand wave pressure according to design specifications.

structure.title: c.护坡石的厚度
structure.text:
# c.护坡石的厚度 当 Lm/hp≤15,护坡石的厚度按下式计算: 当 Lm/hp>15,护坡石的厚度按下式计算: 计算得,护坡石块的厚度: $\mathrm{t}{=}0.36\mathrm{m}$ ,取护坡石块厚 $0.40\mathrm{m}$ 。 方案二:混凝土预制块护坡,护坡平面尺寸 $1\times1\mathrm{m}$ 。护坡厚度按下式计算: $$ t=0.07\eta h_{p}\sqrt[3]{\frac{L_{m}}{b}}\frac{\rho_{w}}{\rho_{c}-\rho_{_w}}\frac{\sqrt{m^{2}+1}}{m} $$ 式中: $\eta$ —系数,取 $\eta=1.1$ ; hp—累积频率为 $1\%$ 的波高( $(\mathsf{m})$ , $\mathrm{h}\mathfrak{p}\overline{{=}}1.30$ ; Lm—平均波长( $\mathsf{m})$ ), $\ L_{\mathfrak{m}}{=}16.29$ ; b—沿坝坡向板长; ρc—板的密度( $(\uptan^{3})$ ),取 $\uprho_{\mathtt{C}}{=}2.4\mathfrak{t}/\mathfrak{m}^{3}$ 。 计算得,混凝土预制块护坡: $\mathrm{t}{=}0.268\mathrm{m}$ ,取 $\mathrm{t}{=}0.3\mathrm{m}$ 。 方案三:现浇混凝土护坡。考虑坝坡护坡翻修将不可避免产生不均匀沉降,现浇 C30 混凝土板平面尺寸确定为 $3.0{\times}3.0\mathrm{m}$ ,护坡中部设置直径 $10\mathrm{mm}$ 钢筋网一层,间排距 $200\mathrm{mm}$ ,混凝土护坡厚度计算方法同混凝土预制块护坡。 计算得: $\mathrm{t}{=}0.186\mathrm{m}$ ,取 $\mathrm{t}{=}0.2\mathrm{m}$ 。 三个护坡方案的技术经济比较见表 5.6.2-2。 表 5.6.2-2 围坝上游护坡各方案技术经济比较表(取 $100\mathrm{m}^{2}$ 护坡)
方案主要工程内容和 工程量优缺点投资 （万元）
优点缺点
方案一 浆砌石护坡40cm厚M10浆 砌石40m3抗冲刷能力强, 外形美观，实施 难度低，投资较 省。开采石料污染环 境；运输距离 远，长达 40km; 砌筑工序杂，工 期长。1.72
方案二 混凝土预制块 护坡30cm厚砼预制块 30m3预制块制作简 单，适应变形能 力强；施工速度 快，工期短。需预制场制作, 存在冲刷剥蚀问 题2.56
方案三 现浇钢筋混凝 土护坡20cm 厚C30混 凝土 20m²、钢筋 0.62t施工较方便，工 期短后期易出现剥 蚀、老化现象1.75
每 $100\mathsf{m}^{2}$ 护坡,方案二造价最高,且后期运行过程中易出现冲刷、剥蚀问题,因此不予采用;方案三和方案一相比投资略高,但方案一石料运输距离长达$40\mathtt{c m}$ ,施工工序复杂,工期长。综合考虑选取方案三为护坡推荐型式。
structure.summary: The partial document details the design, calculation, and selection process for the upstream slope protection of a dam. It provides specific thickness calculations and technical parameters for three distinct options: masonry stone (Option 1), precast concrete blocks (Option 2), and cast-in-place reinforced concrete (Option 3). The document includes a technical and economic comparison table (Table 5.6.2-2) that evaluates each scheme based on engineering quantities, advantages, disadvantages, and investment costs. Ultimately, the text justifies the selection of the cast-in-place reinforced concrete (Option 3) as the recommended type due to its construction convenience, shorter duration, and superior economic feasibility compared to the logistical challenges of stone transport and the higher cost of precast blocks.

structure.title: 2)下游护坡
structure.text:
# 2)下游护坡  

草皮护坡为一种有效、美观,有利于生态环境,为平原水库背坡的首选形式。本工程气候条件湿润,雨水充足,适合草皮生长;另外本工程库区开挖、坝基清理均产生大量的耕植土,耕植土可用于草皮护坡以减少弃渣。因此本工程下游坝面采用草皮护坡,为利于植被生长,草皮护坡下部设置 30cm 厚耕植土。为方便管理,坝顶至下游坡脚之间布置踏步,每 $500\mathrm{m}$ 布置一道台阶,M10 浆砌石结构,坡比 1:3,踏步高度 $0.15\mathrm{m}$ ,宽度 $1.5\mathrm{m}$ 。  

针对临近共渠段的下游坝坡,结合贴坡排水的布置,利用贴坡排水起到共渠  

水深时的冲刷防护作用。
structure.summary: The partial document outlines the downstream slope protection measures for a reservoir project. The main points include the selection of sod protection for its ecological and aesthetic benefits, its suitability to the local humid climate, and the reuse of excavated topsoil to support vegetation growth. It also specifies construction details for management steps made of M10 masonry and describes the use of drainage blankets to protect downstream slopes near the Gong Canal from erosion.

structure.title: (4)坝体排水
structure.text:
# (4)坝体排水  

考虑本工程围坝坝高较低,坝体排水采用贴坡排水型式。根据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》(SL274-2020)贴坡排水顶部高程高于坝体浸润线出逸点的高度应按下列规定确定:  

1)1 级坝、2 级坝不应小于 $2.00\mathsf{m}$ ;  
2)应超过波浪沿坡面的爬高;  
3)应满足坝体浸润线在该地区的冻深以下。  

根据渗流计算结果,围坝下游浸润线出逸点最高高程为 $74.62\mathrm{m}$ ,本工程最大冻土深度为 $28\mathtt{c m}$ ,贴坡排水顶高程应不低于 $76.62\mathrm{m}$ ;考虑共渠来大洪水时存在漫堤的可能,坝下游最高水位按共渠漫堤水位 $75.82\mathrm{m}$ 考虑,贴坡排水顶高程不应低于 $77.82\mathrm{m}$ ,取 $78.0\mathrm{m}$ ,低于坝顶高程 $3.5\mathsf{m}$ 。  

贴坡排水顶高程按低于坝顶高程 $3.5\mathsf{m}$ 考虑,厚度为 50cm。排水体下部依次设置 30cm 碎石垫层和 30cm 中粗砂垫层。贴坡排水底部设置 $0.5\mathrm{m}$ 厚水平排水垫层,水平排水垫层上、下层各设置下部设置 30cm 碎石垫层和 30cm 中粗砂垫层,水平排水垫层与下游截渗沟相接。
structure.summary:
This partial document details the design and specifications for the dam body drainage system. Key points include:

1. **Drainage Type and Standards**: Due to the low height of the dam, a slope-protection drainage (贴坡排水) model was selected. The design adheres to the SL274-2020 code, which dictates height requirements based on the seepage line, wave run-up, and frost depth.
2. **Elevation Determination**: Based on seepage calculations (74.62m), frost depth (28cm), and potential flood levels from the Gong Canal (75.82m), the top elevation of the drainage is set at 78.0m, which is 3.5m below the dam crest.
3. **Structural Composition**: The drainage system consists of a 50cm thick main drainage layer, supported by 30cm gravel and 30cm coarse sand cushions.
4. **Horizontal Drainage**: A 0.5m thick horizontal drainage cushion is specified at the base, featuring multi-layer sand and gravel cushions, which ultimately connects to the downstream seepage ditch.

structure.title: (5)坝面排水
structure.text:
# (5)坝面排水  

按《碾压式土石坝设计规范》(SL274-2020)5.9.1条规定:除干砌石或堆石护坡外,均须设置坝面排水;包括坝顶、坝坡、坝头及坝下游等部位的集水、截水和排水设施;竖向排水沟每 $50{\sim}100\mathrm{m}$ 设置一条。  

为防止雨水冲刷下游坝坡,围坝每隔 $100\mathrm{m}$ 设一条竖向排水沟,采用 C20 预制混凝土结构,矩形断面,横断面 $0.2\times0.2\mathrm{m}$ (宽 $\times$ 深),壁厚 $0.1\mathsf{m}$ 。末端与截渗沟相接。
structure.summary:
This document outlines the design standards and technical specifications for dam surface drainage. Key points include:
1. **Regulatory Compliance:** It adheres to the "Standard for Design of Embankment Dams" (SL274-2020), which mandates drainage facilities for various dam sections (except for dry masonry or rockfill slopes) and specifies vertical drainage ditch intervals of 50–100m.
2. **Implementation for Downstream Slopes:** To prevent rainwater erosion, vertical drainage ditches are placed every 100m along the downstream slope of the embankment.
3. **Technical Parameters:** The drainage ditches are constructed using C20 precast concrete with a rectangular cross-section measuring $0.2\times0.2\mathrm{m}$ and a wall thickness of $0.1\mathrm{m}$.
4. **Discharge System:** The vertical ditches are designed to connect to a seepage intercepting ditch at their terminus.

structure.title: (6)截渗沟
structure.text:
# (6)截渗沟  

参照《平原水库工程设计规范》(DB37/1342-2009)条文 8.10.1、8.10.2:“为了防止平原水库蓄水后引起周围地下水升高,导致土地沼泽化和土地盐渍化,恶化附近地区生态环境,必须在水库围坝背水面坝脚设置截渗沟或截渗暗管。拦截水库渗水、控制水库周围地下水位不超过临界水位;截渗沟应尽量结合现有的排水系统设置,一般采用明沟型式。  

截渗沟采用明沟式,结合工程经验,截渗沟的净断面尺寸初拟底宽 2m,深度 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,采用干砌石砌筑,厚度 30cm。底部设置 15cm 碎石垫层和 15cm 中粗砂垫层。截渗沟外设 DN1000 钢筋混凝土排水管,排水管管顶埋深不小于 $1.5\mathrm{m}$ ,排泄渗水至下游河道。
structure.summary: This document segment outlines the design specifications and technical requirements for a seepage interception ditch (截渗沟) for a plain reservoir project. Key points include the purpose of the ditch (to prevent soil salinization and marshland formation by controlling groundwater levels in accordance with DB37/1342-2009), its structural form (an open ditch type), specific dimensions and construction materials (2m wide, 2m deep, dry stone masonry with gravel and sand cushions), and the drainage mechanism using reinforced concrete pipes to discharge seepage water to downstream channels.

structure.title: 5.6.2.3 抗冰冻设计
structure.text:
# 5.6.2.3 抗冰冻设计  

根据《水工建筑物抗冰冻设计规范》(GB/T 50662-2011)条文 6.3.2,本工程冻胀级别为Ⅴ级,防冻层厚度应不小于当地最大冻深。根据水文资料,坝址区的标准冻结深度为 $0.28\mathrm{m}$ ,即防冻层厚度应不小于 $0.28\mathrm{m}$ 。  

防冻层包括面层和砂砾料垫层。上游混凝土护坡厚度 20cm,下部设置 10cm碎石垫层和 10cm 中粗砂垫层;围坝下游护坡在渗流溢出点附近设置贴坡排水,排水体厚度为 $0.5\mathrm{m}$ ,两侧设置 30cm 碎石垫层和 30cm 中粗砂垫层。围坝上、下游护坡防冻层厚度大于当地最大冻深,满足抗冰冻设计要求。
structure.summary: This section outlines the anti-freezing design for a dam project in accordance with the GB/T 50662-2011 standard. It identifies the project's frost heave level as Grade V and establishes a minimum anti-freezing layer thickness of $0.28\mathrm{m}$ based on local hydrological data. The document details the specific structural compositions of the upstream and downstream slope protections—including concrete surfacing, gravel, and sand cushions—and concludes that the design meets safety requirements as the total thicknesses exceed the maximum frost depth.

structure.title: 5.6.2.4 基础处理设计
structure.text:
# 5.6.2.4 基础处理设计  

(1)坝基地质条件  

坝基岩性上部主要为第 $\textcircled{1}$ 层和第 $\textcircled{2}$ 层重粉质壤土,厚约 $5{\sim}7.2\ensuremath{\mathrm{m}}$ ;中部为第$\textcircled{3}$ 层轻粉质壤土和第 $\textcircled{4}$ 层粉细砂层,其中轻粉质壤土厚约 $1.0{\sim}3.1\ensuremath{\mathrm{m}}$ ,粉细砂厚$0.6{\sim}7.9\mathrm{m}$ ;下部为第 $\textcircled{6}$ 层重粉质壤土和其下的第 $\textcircled{6}$ -1 层细砂层。若库区或坝基开挖较少则上部重粉质壤土为天然的隔水层。
structure.summary: This section describes the geological conditions of a dam foundation as part of a foundation treatment design. It details the stratigraphy of the site, outlining the specific soil layers (heavy silty loam, light silty loam, and fine sand) found at the upper, middle, and lower depths, including their thicknesses and the potential for upper layers to act as a natural impermeable barrier.

structure.title: (2)清基开挖设计
structure.text:
# (2)清基开挖设计  

库区地表主要为全新统上段冲积物( $\mathsf{Q}_{4}\mathsf{2a l}$ )(地层岩性主要为重粉质壤土)和 $\textcircled{1}$ 重粉质壤土。根据地质资料,地表耕植层厚度平均约 $0.6m$ 。另外,在场区道路及村庄附近分布有厚度 $0.5\mathsf{m}\sim1.0\mathsf{m}$ 不等的人工填土,成分以杂填土为主,道路附近有少量垃圾,卫河共渠右岸有堤防,成分为素填土。河道中有淤积物,岩性主要为重粉质壤土,灰黑色,软塑\~流塑状,见有蜗壳,有腥臭味,见有植物根系和生活垃圾。  

根据库区坝基情况,依据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》(SL274-2020)条文7.1.2,对河道淤积物、植物根系和生活垃圾等进行清除,清基后的坝基面应整平和压实。本阶段坝基清基平均厚度按 $0.7\mathsf{m}$ 考虑。
structure.summary: This document segment outlines the foundation excavation design for a reservoir project. It details the geological characteristics of the site, including the presence of heavy silty loam, artificial fill, and riverbed silt containing organic waste and plant roots. Based on the "Design Code for Rolled Earth-Rock Fill Dams" (SL274-2020), the text specifies requirements for clearing unsuitable materials and leveling/compacting the foundation surface, establishing an average foundation cleaning thickness of 0.7 meters.

structure.title: (3)坝基液化处理措施
structure.text:
# (3)坝基液化处理措施  

场地第 $\textcircled{3}$ 层轻粉质壤土和第 $\textcircled{4}$ 层细砂为可液化层,土体遇震液化时,地基软化,析水沉降,土体积缩小、孔隙压力增加,使有效压力减小,土体抗剪强度迅速减小或完全丧失,造成坝体沉降及坝坡深层滑动,坝体沉降不均,产生坝体裂缝,影响大坝安全。  

根据《水工建筑物抗震设计标准》(GB51247-2018),地基中的可液化土层,可根据工程的类型和具体情况,选择采用下列抗震措施:  

$\textcircled{1}$ 挖除液化土层并用非液化土置换; $\textcircled{2}$ 振冲加密、强劳击实等人工加密; $\textcircled{3}$ 压重和排水; $\textcircled{4}$ 振冲挤密碎石桩等复合地基或桩体穿过可液化土层进入非液化土层的桩 基; $\textcircled{5}$ 混凝土连续墙或其他方法围封可液化地基。  

本工程坝基范围面积约 171.45 万 $\mathsf{m}^{2}$ ,坝基液化层平均埋深约 $5.2\mathrm{m}$ ,平均厚度约 $8\mathsf{m}$ ,若采用挖除置换方法,开挖量约和回填量较大,同时将产生大量弃渣,因而不考虑此方案;因本工程位于平原,附近可供开采的石料距离坝址区距离较远,约 $40k m$ ,从降低工程造价、减少运输压力和劳力消耗、加快施工进度和有利环境保护等因素考虑不适合采用振冲挤密碎石桩方案。  

因此,本阶段对强夯、围封、压重三种不同方案进行比选,具体如下:
structure.summary: This document outlines the treatment measures for liquefiable dam foundations. It identifies the risks posed by liquefiable layers of light silty loam and fine sand, such as settlement, reduced shear strength, and potential dam failure. Based on the seismic design standard GB51247-2018, the document lists several potential treatment methods but excludes excavation/replacement and gravel piles due to high costs, large volumes, and material transport issues. Ultimately, it focuses on comparing three specific schemes for the project: dynamic compaction, enclosure, and surcharge.

structure.title: 1)方案一 强夯方案
structure.text:
# 1)方案一 强夯方案  

清基后对坝基进行强夯处理。强夯法适用于透水性较好的松软碎石土地基或松砂地基,能够有效解决地震液化的问题,且能够提高地基承载力,减小沉降量,具有施工简单、加固效果好、使用经济等优点。对各类土强夯处理都取得了十分良好的技术经济效果。不足之处是强烈的震动可能会对己建成的工程造成不利影响,甚至引起变形。本工程强夯采用单击夯击能 $12000\mathsf{k N}\cdot\mathsf{m}$ ,夯锤底面积 $5\mathsf{m}^{2}$ ,点夯 3 遍,夯点问距 $10\mathsf{m}$ ;满夯 2 遍,每遍 1 击,单击夯击能 $4000\mathsf{k N}^{\bullet}\mathsf{m}$ 。处理范围每边超出基础外缘的宽度为基础底面下处理深度的 1/2,且大于 5m,本工程坝基宽度 $56\mathrm{m}$ ,处理范围每边超出基础宽度 5m,即计算处理范围宽度约为$66\mathsf{m}$ 。
structure.summary: The document describes "Option 1: Dynamic Compaction" for dam foundation treatment, outlining its suitability for soft gravelly or sandy soils. It highlights the method's advantages—such as preventing seismic liquefaction, increasing bearing capacity, and cost-effectiveness—while noting the disadvantage of vibrations potentially affecting nearby structures. Additionally, the text specifies technical parameters for the procedure, including hammer energy levels, compaction passes, and the defined treatment area width based on the dam's dimensions.

structure.title: 2)方案二 围封法
structure.text:
# 2)方案二 围封法  

对于库区开挖区附近的围坝采用塑性混凝土防渗墙围封处理,防渗墙厚度$0.4\mathsf{m}$ ,具体措施如下:上游塑性混凝土防渗墙设置于上游坡脚外侧、压重台底部;同样在坝下游坡脚外侧设置一道塑性混凝土防渗墙,墙底伸入相对不透水层(第$\textcircled{6}$ 层重粉质壤土层)内 1m。两道防渗墙之间设置横向连墙,连墙间距 $50\mathrm{m}$ ,以使基础形成围封,减小地震液化影响,如图 5.6.2-2 所示。  

![](images/616334b3be009e25245e467ca77845f0063d368af14df4b5306d51888098d0d2.jpg)  
图 5.6.2-2 围封方案断面图  

3)压重法  

填土压重可以增加可液化土层上覆非液化层的厚度和有效应力,常用于土石坝上、下游地基。压重高度按《建筑抗震设计规范》(GB50011-2010)4.3.3确定:  

浅埋天然地基的建筑,当上覆非液化土层厚度符合下列条件之一时,可不考虑液化影响:
structure.summary: This partial document outlines two technical schemes for mitigating seismic liquefaction and managing seepage in dam foundations. The first is the "Enclosure Method" (Scheme 2), which involves constructing 0.4m thick plastic concrete diaphragm walls at the upstream and downstream slope toes, keyed into an impermeable soil layer and linked by transverse walls every 50 meters to form an enclosed foundation. The second is the "Surcharge Method" (Scheme 3), which focuses on increasing the effective stress and thickness of non-liquefiable overburden by adding fill material, citing the "Code for Seismic Design of Buildings" (GB50011-2010) for determining the required surcharge height to minimize liquefaction risks.

structure.title: du>d0+db-2
structure.text:
# du>d0+db-2  

du——上覆盖非液化土层厚度(m),计算时宜将淤泥和淤泥质土层扣除;  
db——基础埋置深度(m),不超过 2m 时应采用 $_{2\mathsf{m}}$ ;  
d0——液化土特征深度 $(\mathsf{m})$ ,本工程地震烈度为Ⅷ度,取 $_{2\mathsf{m}}$ 。  

根据上述公式,当本工程上覆非液化土层厚度大于 $8\mathsf{m}$ 时可不考虑地震液化的影响,坝基岩性上部主要为第 $\textcircled{1}$ 层和第 $\textcircled{2}$ 层重粉质壤土,厚约 $4.8{\sim}5.6\ensuremath{\mathrm{m}}$ ,因此压重平台高度不小于 $4\mathrm{m}$ 。  

具体压重措施:在坝体上、下游各设置一压重平台。压重平台顶高程 $80.00\mathrm{m}$ ,宽 $15\mathrm{m}$ ,压重高度约 $5.5\mathsf{m}$ ,坡比 1:3,采用重粉质壤土填筑,压实度为 $92\%$ 。压重平台如图 5.6.2-3 所示。  

![](images/1a7fb9552ae6c97ee8e0a8db841f6bf615d25668eaefe0c2bb229263861d0585.jpg)  
图 5.6.2-3 压重方案断面图
structure.summary: This document describes the technical criteria and design measures for preventing soil liquefaction at a dam site. It outlines the mathematical formula used to determine the required thickness of the overlying non-liquefiable soil layer based on foundation depth and seismic intensity. Since the natural soil thickness (4.8–5.6m) is insufficient to meet the safety threshold (8m), the document specifies the construction of upstream and downstream ballast platforms. These platforms, approximately 5.5m high and 15m wide, are designed using heavy silty loam with a 92% compaction rate to mitigate liquefaction risks, as illustrated in the provided cross-section diagram.

structure.title: 4)方案比选
structure.text:
# 4)方案比选 以上方案都能防止坝基出现地震液化,对不同方案工程投资进行比较,具体如表 5.6.2-10 所示。 表 5.6.2-2 不同地震液化处理方案投资表
防渗方案单位数量单价 （元）投资 （万元）
强夯法m216049838012839.863
围封法（40cm厚塑性砼防渗墙）m21313250510.6767063.738
压重法m3425888452.4922354.882
由上表可知,强夯法投资最省,为 13716.3 万元;压重方案投资为 12446.6万元;围封法投资最高,为 67063.7 万元。本工程坝基为重粉质壤土,强夯法主要适用于砂性土,采用强夯法效果欠佳;考虑到压重能减少部分弃渣,有利于环保,因此本工程采用压重法处理坝基地震液化。
structure.summary: 该文档片段主要介绍了坝基地震液化处理方案的比选过程。内容涵盖了强夯法、围封法（塑性砼防渗墙）和压重法三种方案的工程量及投资估算对比。通过分析不同方案的技术适用性与经济性，文档指出强夯法不适用于重粉质壤土，而压重法因具有投资相对较低、能减少弃渣且利于环保等优势，被确定为本工程坝基地震液化的处理方案。

structure.title: 5.6.2.5 围坝渗流计算
structure.text:
# 5.6.2.5 围坝渗流计算 渗流稳定计算采用二维有限元法,利用河海大学有限元分析软件Autobank7.7 进行计算。 (1)计算方法 对于稳定渗流,符合达西定律的非均各向异性二维渗流场,水头势函数满足微分方程 $$ \begin{array}{r}{\frac{\partial}{\partial\mathbf{x}}\left(\mathbf{k}_{\mathrm{x}}\frac{\partial\Phi}{\partial\mathbf{x}}\right)+\frac{\partial}{\partial\mathbf{y}}\left(\mathbf{k}_{\mathrm{y}}\frac{\partial\Phi}{\partial\mathbf{y}}\right)+\boldsymbol{0}=0}\end{array} $$ 式中: $\Phi=\Phi\left(\mathbf{x},\mathsf{y}\right)$ 为待求水头势函数; x,y 为平面坐标; Kx,Ky 为 x,y 轴方向的渗透系数。 水头 $\Phi$ 还必须满足一定的边界条件,经常出现以下几种边界条件: 1) 在上游边界上水头已知 $$ \boldsymbol\Phi=\boldsymbol\Phi\boldsymbol n $$ 2) 在逸出边界水头和位置高程相等 $$ \Phi{=}_{\mathbf{Z}} $$ 3) 在某边界上渗流量 $\mathfrak{q}$ 已知 $$ \operatorname{k}_{\mathrm{x}}{\frac{\partial\Phi}{\partial\mathrm{x}}}\mathrm{l}_{\mathrm{x}}+\mathrm{k}_{\mathrm{y}}{\frac{\partial\Phi}{\partial\mathrm{y}}}\mathrm{l}_{\mathrm{y}}=-\mathrm{q} $$ 其中 lx,ly 为边界表面向外法线在 $\texttt{x,y}$ 方向的余弦。 将渗流场用有限元离散,假定单元渗流场的水头函数势 $\Phi$ 为多项式,由微分方程及边界条件确定问题的变分形式,可导得出线性方程组: $$ [\mathrm{H}]\{\Phi\}=\{\mathrm{F}\} $$ 式中[H]——渗透矩阵; $\{\Phi\}$ ——渗流场水头;{F}——节点渗流量。 求解以上方程组可以得到节点水头,据此求得单元的水力坡降,流速等物理量。求解渗流场的关键是确定浸润线位置,Autobank 采用节点流量平衡法通过迭代计算自动确定浸润线位置和渗流量。 (2)计算断面 本次计算取水库开挖区围坝最高断面作为计算断面,见图5.6.2-4。 ![](images/6454530d707a821fbab96dbe9c1308f3bf8444583688cb884971df45a5271ca2.jpg) 5.6.2-4 围坝计算断面 (3)计算工况 根据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》(SL274-2020),渗流计算应包括下列水位组合情况: 1)上游正常蓄水位与下游相应的最低水位; 2)上游设计洪水位与下游相应的水位; 3)上游校核洪水位与下游相应的水位; 4)库水位降落时上游坝坡稳定最不利的水位组合。 各计算工况相应水位见表5.6.2-3。 表 5.6.2-3 围坝渗流计算工况表
计算工况部位水位(m)
工况一正常蓄水位上游73.00
下游71.62
工况二设计洪水位上游77.5
下游74.65
工况三校核洪水位上游77.8
下游74.65
工况四水位降落上游77.8~73.00(△t=48h)
下游71.62
structure.summary:
This document outlines the seepage calculation for a perimeter dam, specifically detailing:
1. **Calculation Method**: The use of two-dimensional finite element analysis (FEM) via Autobank 7.7 software, including the governing differential equations, boundary conditions, and the iterative node flow balance method used to determine the phreatic line.
2. **Calculation Section**: The selection of the highest dam section in the reservoir excavation area as the representative model for analysis.
3. **Calculation Conditions**: Four specific operating scenarios defined by the "Design Code for Rolled Earth-Rock Fill Dams" (SL274-2020), which include normal storage level, design flood level, check flood level, and reservoir drawdown, along with their corresponding upstream and downstream water levels.

structure.title: (4)计算参数
structure.text:
# (4)计算参数 根据地质建议,本次渗流计算参数见表 5.6.2-4。 表 5.6.2-4 围坝渗流计算参数表

structure.summary: This partial document provides the specific parameters used for seepage calculation of a surrounding dam, based on geological recommendations. It primarily consists of a table detailing the permeability coefficients (K, Kx, and Ky) for various soil layers—such as heavy silty loam and fine sand—as well as specific dam components, including the dam body, drainage system, filter materials, and ballast.

structure.title: (5)计算结果与分析
structure.text:
# (5)计算结果与分析 渗流计算中模拟了四种工况,渗流计算结果见表 5.6.2-5,断面浸润线及水头等值线图见图 $5.6.2–5\sim$ 图 5.6.2-8。 表 5.6.2-5 围坝渗流计算成果表
工况下游出逸点 高程（m)坝基渗透比降下游渗流出逸点比 降值渗漏量 (m3/d/m)

正常蓄水位71.740.0200.450.450.506
设计洪水位73.230.2060.2269.66
校核洪水位73.230.260.30210.48
水位骤降73.230.2270.3122.91
由表 5.6.2-5 可以看出: (1)正常蓄水位工况下坝体及坝基总渗流量为 $0.506\mathsf{m}^{3}/\mathsf{d}/\mathsf{m}$ ,渗漏量较小;设计洪水位和校核洪水位工况渗流量分别为 $9.66\mathsf{m}^{3}/\mathsf{d}/\mathsf{m}$ 、 $10.48\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathrm{d}/\mathrm{m}$ ,考虑本工程为防洪水库,无兴利任务,洪水持续过程较短,上述渗漏量不影响工程安全。(2)在各种工况下,坝体下游面的渗透比降均满足坝体土料的允许比降;综上,坝体下游满足渗流稳定要求。 ![](images/67b130573fa20778c6b16f46db2a67a9c7a7d3d0ff038e00f6e88d5aa6fb08d6.jpg) 图 5.6.2.5 正常蓄水位工况浸润线和水头等值线 ![](images/556b593e2553b72795989c2be5d5b43608717a5e081fda25e7f121ebd86ee65f.jpg) 图 5.6.2.6 设计洪水位工况浸润线和水头等值线 ![](images/0f2b444fa903ea3e913367fd64fe321e498463ca4e4bff7d6c487cb499e82d63.jpg) 图 5.6.2.7 校核洪水位工况浸润线和水头等值线 ![](images/897599b7180f1c9799f9eb0b0025048f56d84c0bf4ad5826e27b40a50e5f7706.jpg) 图 5.6.2.8 水位骤降工况浸润线
structure.summary: 该文档片段主要介绍了围坝渗流计算的结果与分析。内容涵盖了在正常蓄水位、设计洪水位、校核洪水位及水位骤降四种工况下的渗流模拟数据，详细列出了各工况下的下游出逸点高程、坝基及下游出逸点的渗透比降（计算值与允许值）以及渗漏量。通过对比分析，得出各工况下的渗漏量对工程安全无影响，且渗透比降均满足允许比降要求，坝体下游渗流保持稳定。此外，文档还包含了各工况对应的浸润线和水头等值线示意图。

structure.title: 5.6.2.6 坝坡稳定计算
structure.summary:
This document describes the slope stability calculation for a dam, covering the following main points:
1. **Calculation Methodology**: It specifies the use of the Simplified Bishop Method in accordance with the "Design Code for Rolled Earth-Rock Fill Dams" (SL274-2020) and provides the relevant mathematical formulas and variable definitions.
2. **Design Conditions**: It outlines various calculation scenarios for both upstream and downstream slopes, including normal water levels, design and check flood levels, water level drawdown, construction periods, and seismic conditions (Intensity VIII).
3. **Calculation Parameters**: It details the selection criteria for physical and mechanical parameters, emphasizing the use of total and effective stress indicators.
4. **Material Properties**: It includes a comprehensive table of physical and mechanical parameters for different soil layers and dam materials, such as unit weight, cohesion, and internal friction angles.

structure.summary: The document presents the stability calculation results for dam slopes under various operating conditions, including normal operation (normal and design flood water levels), extraordinary operation (check flood level, water level drawdown, and construction period), and seismic conditions. It includes a detailed data table (Table 5.6.2-7) comparing calculated upstream and downstream safety factors against allowable regulatory standards. The text concludes that the dam slopes are stable across all scenarios, as the minimum safety factors exceed required values, and provides references to figures illustrating the most dangerous sliding surfaces for each condition.

structure.title: 5.6.2.7 围坝沉降计算
structure.text:
# 5.6.2.7 围坝沉降计算 (1)计算方法 根据《碾压式土石坝设计规范》SL274-2020 附录 E,黏性土坝体和坝基的竣工时的沉降量和最终沉降量可用分层总和法按下式计算: $$ S_{t}=\sum_{i=1}^{n}{\frac{e_{i0}-e_{i t}}{1+e_{i0}}}h_{i} $$ 式中 St—竣工时或最终的坝体和坝基总沉降量, $\mathsf{m}$ ; ei0—第 i 层初始孔隙比; eit—第 i 层相应于竣工时或最终的竖向有效应力作用下的孔隙比; hi—第 i 层土层厚度,m; n—土层分层数。 竣工后的坝顶沉降量应为最终沉降量减去竣工时沉降量的差值。 对于非黏性土坝体及坝基按下式估算最终沉降量: $$ S_{\infty}=\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{p_{i}}{E_{i}}h_{i} $$ 式中 $S_{\infty}.$ —坝体和坝基最终沉降量, $\mathsf{m}$ ; pi—第 i 层计算土层由坝体荷载产生的竖向应力,kPa; Ei—第 i 层计算土层的变形模量,kPa。 坝基第四层粉细砂采用非粘性土计算公式,其它部位采用粘性土计算公式。 坝体自重引起的地基附加应力按下式计算: $$ P_{\operatorname*{max}}=\frac{2R}{B+2y} $$ 式中 $\mathrm{{P}_{m a x}}$ ——计算层面上的最大竖向应力, $\mathrm{kPa}$ ; R——坝自重合力, $\mathrm{kN}/\mathrm{m}$ ;计算点坝基深度,m。 (2)计算原则 计算断面选取围坝最大坝高断面,计算中坝体分层厚度为坝体高度的 $1/5\sim$ 1/10,本次计算坝体共分为 8 层,分层厚度约 $1\mathsf{m}$ 。坝基受压层的计算深度按坝体附加应力等于坝基自重竖向应力 $20\%$ 处的深度,计算得 $25.0\mathsf{m}$ ,坝基分层厚度不大于坝底宽度的 1/4 且不大于 $10\mathsf{m}$ 。 根据《水工设计手册-第 6 卷土石坝》(第二版),计算时假定粘土层 $80\%$ 的沉降量发生在施工期, $20\%$ 沉降量发生在运行期;非粘性土沉降量在施工期已完成。 表 5.6.2-8 坝体沉降计算成果表

structure.summary:
The provided document section details the settlement calculation for a peripheral dam, focusing on the following main points:

1. **Calculation Methodology:** It outlines the formulas and standards (based on SL274-2020) used to calculate the settlement of cohesive and non-cohesive soils in both the dam body and its foundation, including methods for determining vertical effective stress.
2. **Calculation Principles:** It specifies the parameters for the analysis, such as selecting the maximum dam height section, defining layer thicknesses for the dam (8 layers) and foundation, and setting the calculation depth for the foundation's pressure layer.
3. **Settlement Timing Assumptions:** It details the assumptions for when settlement occurs, noting that 80% of clay settlement is expected during construction and 20% during operation, while non-cohesive soil settlement is completed during construction.
4. **Quantitative Results:** It provides detailed calculation tables for the dam body and foundation settlement across various soil layers (heavy silty loam and fine sand).
5. **Summary of Findings:** It concludes with a summary table showing total settlement values (totaling 0.402m) partitioned into pre-completion and post-completion phases, as well as the total settlement's percentage relative to the dam height.

structure.title: (3)计算结果
structure.text:
# (3)计算结果  

由以上计算坝体沉降量 $0.129\mathrm{m}$ ,坝基沉降量 $0.262\mathrm{m}$ ,坝体及坝基总沉降量$0.402\mathrm{m}$ 。竣工前坝体和坝基总沉降量为 $0.345\mathrm{m}$ ;竣工后坝体和坝基总沉降量为$0.057\mathrm{m}$ ,与坝高的比值为 $0.70\%$ 。根据沉降计算,坝顶竣工后的预留沉降超高取坝高的 $1\%$ 。

structure.title: 5.6.3 库区开挖设计
structure.text:
# 5.6.3 库区开挖设计 (1)库区地质条件 库区挖库范围内地质结构为粘砂多层结构,上部为重粉质壤土,一般具弱透水性,可作为相对隔水层,下部为细砂、砂壤土、轻粉质壤土等少粘性土,一般具中等透水性。根据挖库范围内钻探揭露情况,库区上部隔水层厚度分布不均,邻近围坝区厚度一般 $5{\sim}9\ensuremath{\mathrm{m}}$ ,下部砂层连续分布且厚度超过 5m;其它挖库区隔水层厚度一般 $8{\sim}10\mathrm{m}$ ,但深度 $4{\sim}7\ensuremath{\mathrm{m}}$ 附近分布有厚度约 1m 的砂性土透镜体。库内开挖区钻孔揭露的相对隔水层厚度情况见表 5.6.3-1。 表 5.6.3-1 库内开挖区相对隔水层厚度

structure.summary: 该文档片段主要介绍了库区开挖设计的地质条件，重点阐述了挖库范围内的地层结构及其透水特性。内容涵盖了上部相对隔水层（重粉质壤土）与下部中等透水层（细砂、砂壤土等）的分布规律与厚度情况，并详细列出了库内开挖区各钻孔（如TL、XHZ、HH系列等）揭露的孔口高程、隔水层厚度及下部透水层具体构成的数据表（表5.6.3-1），计算出隔水层的平均厚度为7.54米。

structure.title: (2)开挖方案
structure.text:
# (2)开挖方案  

库区防渗是平原水库工程设计的主要技术问题,也是设计过程中的重点和难点。根据库区工程地质条件,为减少水库渗漏,确保水库发挥效益,选择合适经济防渗方案十分重要,常用的防渗措施有水平防渗措施和垂直防渗措施。  

本工程死库容和兴利库容均以开挖的形式形成,开挖区位于水库东南侧,开挖边线距离坝脚 $50\mathrm{m}$ 。本工程库区上部存在微\~弱透水性的重粉质壤土,厚度$5{\sim}9\ensuremath{\mathrm{m}}$ ,为天然隔水层,库区可利用天然隔水层防渗。为保证库区开挖不破坏天然隔水层,控制库区平均开挖深度不大于 $3.5\mathsf{m}$ 。局部重粉质壤土较浅的区域适当减少开挖深度,保证开挖后库区上部的重粉质壤土层厚度不小于 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ;重粉质壤土较厚的区域适当增大开挖深度。规划死库容要求(天然死库容 799 万 $\mathsf{m}^{3}$ )确定开挖总面积约为 $3.46\mathsf{k m}^{2}$ ,开挖坡比为 1:3,开挖的土料部分用于筑坝。  

根据围坝渗流计算,正常蓄水位工况下,坝体及坝基总渗流量为 $0.506\mathsf{m}^{3}/\mathsf{d}/\mathsf{m}$ ,渗漏量不大。
structure.summary:
This document outlines the excavation scheme for a plain reservoir project, focusing on balancing reservoir capacity with anti-seepage requirements. The main points include:

1.  **Anti-Seepage Strategy:** The design prioritizes utilizing a natural impermeable layer of heavy silty loam (5–9m thick) to prevent leakage, rather than relying solely on artificial measures.
2.  **Excavation Depth Control:** To protect the natural impermeable layer, the average excavation depth is limited to 3.5m, ensuring that at least 2.0m of the silty loam remains intact after excavation.
3.  **Technical Specifications:** The excavation covers an area of approximately 3.46 km² on the southeast side of the reservoir to meet dead capacity requirements, utilizing a 1:3 slope.
4.  **Resource Utilization and Safety:** Excavated soil is repurposed for dam construction, and seepage calculations confirm that the leakage rate remains low under normal operating conditions.

structure.title: 5.6.4 现有堤防利用
structure.text:
# 5.6.4 现有堤防利用  

为节省筑坝工程量,本工程西侧围坝下部利用大沙河右岸现有堤防。大沙河右堤可利用段全长 $8.6\mathsf{k m}$ ,堤身高 $1.0{\sim}7.5\mathrm{m}$ ,堤身填土以中重粉质壤土为主,局部为粉质黏土,土质不均一。根据现场原位测试成果,标贯击数 ${\mathfrak{3}}{\sim}16$ 击,平均 6 击,室内试验干密度 $1.39{\sim}1.669/\mathsf{c m}^{3}$ ,平均值为 $1.51\mathsf{g}/\mathsf{c m}^{3}$ ,压缩系数为0.285\~0.577MPa-1,属可塑状,具中等 $\sim$ 高压缩性,堤防填土一般具弱透水性,击实试验最大干密度平均值 $1.719/\mathsf{c m}^{3}$ 。根据试验成果,堤身填土平均压实度0.88,该段堤防填土填筑质量一般。  

大沙河现有堤防堤身填土材料为重粉质壤土,和本工程围坝填筑材料相同,土体渗透性满足筑坝要求,但堤防实测压实度为 $88\%$ ,低于围坝填筑标准( $100\%$ )。考虑对原有堤身进行碾压、夯实处理,使堤身的压实度达到围坝填筑标准十分困难,对堤防和围坝坝体重合部分进行挖除,利用堤身土料筑坝;对于堤防和围坝压重平台重合部分进行保留,将堤防作为围坝压重平台的一部分,堤防和围坝坝体之间的空缺部位用开挖料填平。  

受建设条件限制,围坝西侧终点和大沙河右岸现有堤防连接,连接点处天然地面高程 $77.6\mathrm{m}$ ,堤防堤顶高程约 $79.7\mathrm{m}$ ,堤防防洪标准为 20 年一遇,堤顶高出水库校核洪水位 $1.67\mathrm{m}$ 。连接点处围坝的坝顶高程为 $83.0\mathsf{m}$ ,高出堤顶高程 3m,堤防可在后续工程中进行加高。
structure.summary:
This document section details the plan for utilizing the existing Dasha River right bank embankment for the construction of a western enclosure dam. It covers three main areas:

1.  **Technical Assessment of the Existing Embankment:** It describes the physical characteristics of the 8.6 km embankment stretch, including its height, soil composition (primarily silty loam), and engineering properties. It notes that while the soil material is suitable, the current compaction degree (88%) is lower than the project’s requirement (100%).
2.  **Treatment and Utilization Strategy:** Due to the difficulty of re-compacting the existing structure in situ, the document outlines a plan to excavate overlapping sections for material reuse while integrating other parts of the existing embankment into the new dam's pressure platform.
3.  **Connection Point Specifications:** It defines the geographical and technical parameters where the new enclosure dam meets the existing embankment, specifying ground and crest elevations, flood control standards, and the height difference between the two structures.

structure.title: 5.7 泄洪闸设计
structure.text: # 5.7 泄洪闸设计
structure.summary: # 5.7 泄洪闸设计

structure.title: 5.7.1 泄洪闸布置
structure.text:
# 5.7.1 泄洪闸布置  

泄洪闸布置于水库东南岸平行于荷宝高速的坝线上,泄洪闸轴线与大坝轴线垂直,主要功能将洪水从水库宣泄至下游共产主义渠。当水库水位在汛限水位$73.00\mathrm{m}$ 至防洪高水位 $77.10\mathrm{m}$ 之间时,控制最大下泄流量 $850\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 。水库设计洪水位 $77.50\mathrm{m}$ 时,下泄流量(控泄) $2470\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ ;校核洪水位 $77.80\mathrm{m}$ 时,下泄流量 $5114\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 。  

泄洪闸布置 26 孔,单孔净宽 $12\mathrm{m}$ ,孔口总净宽 $312\mathrm{m}$ ,总宽度 $392\mathrm{m}$ ,闸室长 $^{23\mathrm{m}}$ ,进口底板高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ ,闸墩顶高程 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。  

泄洪闸从上游至下游共分为 6 段:依次为进口连接段、铺盖、闸室段、消力池段、防冲板及浆砌石护底段、出水渠段。各段建筑物布置分述如下:
structure.summary: The partial document describes the layout and technical specifications of a spillway gate (泄洪闸). Its main points include: its geographical location and primary function of discharging floodwater to the downstream Communist Canal; specific discharge capacities corresponding to different water levels (flood limit, design, and check flood levels); technical dimensions such as the number of gates (26), width, and elevations; and the structural composition of the gate, which is divided into six segments from upstream to downstream, including the inlet connection, gate chamber, and stilling basin.

structure.title: (1)进口连接段
structure.text:
# (1)进口连接段  

进口连接段(闸 0-086.50\~闸 0-034.50):长 $60.00\mathrm{m}$ ,平面呈喇叭口形。底板采用 50cm 厚钢筋混凝土结构,上游衔接于库区开挖库容区域,下游侧衔接于铺盖,衔接高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ 。两侧设圆弧型上游翼墙,翼墙半径 $30\mathrm{m}$ ,翼墙顶高程81.70m。
structure.summary:
# (1)进口连接段  

进口连接段(闸 0-086.50\~闸 0-034.50):长 $60.00\mathrm{m}$ ,平面呈喇叭口形。底板采用 50cm 厚钢筋混凝土结构,上游衔接于库区开挖库容区域,下游侧衔接于铺盖,衔接高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ 。两侧设圆弧型上游翼墙,翼墙半径 $30\mathrm{m}$ ,翼墙顶高程81.70m。

structure.title: (2)铺盖
structure.text:
# (2)铺盖  

铺盖段(闸 0-026.50\~闸 0-006.50):长 $20.00\mathrm{m}$ ,厚 $1.0\mathsf{m}$ ,顶面高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ 。两侧设混凝土扶壁式挡墙,挡墙顶高程 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary:
# (2)铺盖  

铺盖段(闸 0-026.50\~闸 0-006.50):长 $20.00\mathrm{m}$ ,厚 $1.0\mathsf{m}$ ,顶面高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ 。两侧设混凝土扶壁式挡墙,挡墙顶高程 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。

structure.title: (3)闸室段
structure.text:
# (3)闸室段  

闸室段(闸 $0{\cdot}006.50\sim$ 闸 $0{+}012.50\$ ):泄洪闸采用开敞式结构,闸门选用平面钢闸门,共 26 孔,单孔净宽 $12.0\mathrm{m}$ 主要用于宣泄洪水。闸室总宽度 $392\mathrm{m}$ ,采用整体式底板,两孔一联,底板顺水流向长 19m,底板最小厚度 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ 。底板进口高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ ,基础底高程 $68.80\mathrm{m}$ 。  

闸顶高程为 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ ,顺水流向长度 $20.0\mathsf{m}$ ,自上游至下游布置有检修桥、撑梁、启闭机房排架柱、交通桥。共布置 2 个边墩、9 个缝墩、10 个中墩,边墩和缝墩长 $28.0\mathsf{m}$ ,厚度 $1.8\mathrm{m}$ ,中墩长 $28.0\mathsf{m}$ ,厚度 $2.4\mathrm{m}$ 。  

上游设置一套检修闸门,工作闸门及启闭机房布置在闸室中间位置。排架顶面高程为 $91.70\mathrm{m}$ ,排架高 $10.0\mathrm{m}$ ,排架柱断面尺寸为 $1.20\times1.20\mathrm{m}$ ,并设置 0.8$\times0.8\mathrm{m}$ (宽 $\times$ 高)连系梁。
structure.summary:
The partial document provides a technical description of the sluice chamber section (闸室段), detailing its structural design, dimensions, and layout. Key points include:
- **Structural Overview:** An open structure with 26 holes, each 12.0m wide, featuring flat steel gates and a total width of 392m.
- **Foundation and Floor:** Details on the integrated floor, including its length (19m), minimum thickness (2.0m), inlet elevation (70.80m), and foundation bottom elevation (68.80m).
- **Piers and Top Structure:** Specifications for the gate top (elevation 81.70m), and the dimensions/quantities of side, joint, and intermediate piers.
- **Facility Layout:** The arrangement of the maintenance bridge, brace beams, hoist room, and traffic bridge, along with specific dimensions and elevations for the hoisting rack and columns.

structure.title: (4)消力池段
structure.text:
# (4)消力池段  

消力池段(闸 $0{+}012.50{\sim}$ 闸 $0{+}0{4}8.00)$ ):长 $35.5\mathsf{m}$ ,其中消力池池长 $30.00\mathrm{m}$ ,池深 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,消力池底板高程 $68.80\mathrm{m}$ ,消力池底板设 $\Phi10\mathsf{c m}$ 排水孔,间排距 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,下设反滤层。消力池两侧设扶壁式挡墙,挡墙顶高程 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary:
# (4)消力池段  

消力池段(闸 $0{+}012.50{\sim}$ 闸 $0{+}0{4}8.00)$ ):长 $35.5\mathsf{m}$ ,其中消力池池长 $30.00\mathrm{m}$ ,池深 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,消力池底板高程 $68.80\mathrm{m}$ ,消力池底板设 $\Phi10\mathsf{c m}$ 排水孔,间排距 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,下设反滤层。消力池两侧设扶壁式挡墙,挡墙顶高程 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。

structure.title: (5)防冲板及浆砌石护底段
structure.text:
# (5)防冲板及浆砌石护底段  

防冲板及浆砌石护底(闸 $0{+}0{4}8.00{\sim}$ 闸 $0{+}098.00~\$ ):消力池后接 20m 长混凝土防冲板,防冲板后接 $30\mathsf{m}$ 浆砌石护底,防冲板及浆砌石护底顶高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ ,厚 1m。两端设圆弧型下游翼墙,翼墙半径 $50\mathrm{m}$ ,翼墙顶高程 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary: 该段落主要介绍了水闸下游防冲板及浆砌石护底段（桩号0+048.00至0+098.00）的工程设计参数，包括20米长混凝土防冲板与30米长浆砌石护底的结构尺寸、顶高程（70.80m）及厚度（1m），并详细说明了配套的圆弧型下游翼墙的半径（50m）及顶高程（81.70m）。

structure.title: (6)出水渠段
structure.text:
# (6)出水渠段  

出水渠段(闸 $0{+}098.00{\sim}$ 闸 $0{+}747.00~\$ ):该段渠道长 $649\mathsf{m}$ ,宽度 $530\mathrm{m}$ ,渠底起始高程 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ ,末端高程 $70.15\mathrm{m}$ ,渠道深度 $5.0\mathsf{m}$ ,纵向坡比 1:1000。渠道末端与共产主义渠左岸相接,相接处渠底高程 $70.00\mathrm{m}$ ,渠顶高程 $75.00\mathrm{m}$ 。  

出水渠斜交进入原共产主义渠左岸,共渠斜交范围内渠底及右岸采用 30cm厚混凝土护砌防护。

It also describes the canal's intersection with the left bank of the Communism Canal, highlighting specific elevation data and the 30cm thick concrete lining protection used in the oblique intersection area.

structure.title: 2)波浪高度计算公式
structure.summary:
This document outlines the methodology and specific calculation results for wave height design related to a sluice gate project, based on the "Design Code for Sluices" (SL265-2016). The main points include:

1.  **Calculation Formulas**: It specifies the formulas used to determine average wave height ($h_m$), wave period ($T_m$), wavelength ($L_m$), and the elevation of the wave centerline ($h_z$), as well as the overall sluice crest elevation ($Z$).
2.  **Design Parameters**: It identifies key environmental inputs, such as a fetch length ($D$) of 1.932 km and a calculated wind speed of 20.1 m/s (1.5 times the multi-year average maximum).
3.  **Frequency and Ratios**: For a Grade 2 sluice, it establishes a wave cumulative frequency ($p$) of 2% and uses standard tables to determine the ratio of design wave height to average wave height ($h_p/h_m = 1.80$).
4.  **Calculation Results**: It provides final computed values, including an average wave height ($h_m$) of 0.65 m and a design wave height ($h_p$) of 1.17 m.
5.  **Summary Table**: A data table (Table 5.7.2-2) summarizes the specific hydrological and meteorological inputs and the resulting wave height components under normal storage conditions.

structure.title: (2)闸顶高程计算
structure.text:

根据计算结果,各工况下闸顶高程计算的最大值 $78.88\mathrm{m}$ 。根据《水闸设计规范》(SL 265-2016)中 4.2.5,位于防洪、挡潮堤上的水闸,其闸顶高程不应低于防洪、挡潮堤堤顶高程。坝顶高程 $81.50\mathrm{m}$ ,考虑水闸多年运行后的沉降,水闸闸顶高程取 $81.70\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary: This partial document describes the calculation process for the gate top elevation of a water gate based on the "Design Code for Water Gates" (SL265-2016). It outlines the primary factors determining the elevation, including water levels, wave height, and safety freeboard for both water-retaining and water-discharging scenarios. The document provides a detailed calculation table for various operating conditions—such as normal storage, maximum water levels, and design/check flood levels—and concludes by determining the final gate top elevation (81.70m) after considering the dam crest height and potential settlement.

structure.title: 5.7.3 闸室顺水流向长度的确定
structure.text:
# 5.7.3 闸室顺水流向长度的确定  

闸室底板顺水流向长度应根据闸室地基条件和结构布置要求,以满足闸室整体稳定和地基允许承载力为原则进行综合分析确定闸室底板顺水流向长度为19.00m。  

闸室顶部顺水流向长度主要根据上游检修闸门与工作闸门的相对位置、启闭机房建筑造型的安全距离以及工作桥和交通桥的规模综合确定,拟定闸室顶部顺  

水流向长度为 $20\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary: This partial document describes the criteria and determination of the sluice chamber's length along the direction of water flow. It specifies the length of the chamber's base plate as 19.00m based on stability and foundation requirements, and sets the length of the chamber's top section at 20m based on the arrangement of gates, hoist room requirements, and bridge dimensions.

structure.title: 5.7.4 水力设计
structure.text: # 5.7.4 水力设计
structure.summary: # 5.7.4 水力设计

structure.title: 5.7.4.1 底板高程选择
structure.text:
# 5.7.4.1 底板高程选择  

闸底板高程确定主要考虑以下因素:  

1)上游与挖库范围的衔接,挖库深度 $3.5\mathsf{m}$ ,根据现状地面,近闸处库底高程约 $70.5\mathrm{m}\{0.8\mathrm{m}$ 。闸底板高程应尽量高于挖库底高程,减轻闸前淤积。  

2)底板高程若选择过高,低水位泄流能力将减小,将影响正常蓄水位及防洪高水位,库区征地移民投资将增加。  

3)闸底板高程选择应高于下游共渠底高程 70.00m,同时满足出水渠有一定的坡度。  

综合以上因素,闸底板高程选择为 $70.80\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary:
该部分文档主要阐述了闸底板高程选择的考量因素及最终确定的数值。主要内容包括：
1. **衔接与防淤：** 考虑与上游挖库深度的衔接，确保底板高程高于库底以减轻闸前淤积。
2. **泄流与成本：** 分析了底板高程对低水位泄流能力、正常及防洪高水位的影响，以及由此产生的征地移民投资变化。
3. **下游协调：** 确保底板高程高于下游共渠底高程，并满足出水渠的坡度要求。
4. **确定结果：** 综合上述因素，将闸底板高程定为 70.80m。

structure.title: 5.7.4.2 泄流能力计算
structure.summary: This document outlines the discharge capacity calculation for a sluice gate structure. It provides technical specifications for the gate, including a sill elevation of 70.80m and a 26-gate configuration with a total net width of 312m. The text details the calculation methodology based on the "Code for Design of Sluices" (SL265-2016), incorporating specific formulas for flow rate, side contraction coefficients, and submergence coefficients. Additionally, it includes reference tables for downstream water level-discharge relationships and comprehensive calculation results across various upstream water levels. Finally, it confirms that the sluice's discharge capacity meets planning requirements for both design and check flood levels.

structure.title: 5.7.4.3 消能防冲计算
structure.summary: This document section specifies the calculation methods for energy dissipation and erosion protection for a hydraulic engineering project, specifically focusing on determining the depth of a stilling basin. It outlines the use of the underflow energy dissipation method in accordance with the "Design Specification for Sluice" (SL265-2016) and provides the necessary mathematical formulas and parameter definitions—such as conjugate water depth, contracted water depth, and submergence coefficients—required to calculate the basin's depth and hydraulic performance.

structure.title: (2)消力池长度
structure.summary: This document outlines the design calculations and final specifications for the energy dissipation structures of a water sluice project, specifically focusing on the stilling basin and the apron (riprap). Based on the "Design Code for Sluices" (SL265-2016), it provides the mathematical formulas for determining the length of the stilling basin and the apron. The document includes a results table (Table 5.7.4-2) comparing hydraulic parameters—such as discharge, water levels, and conjugate depths—across different scenarios, including 100-year design floods, 1000-year check floods, and controlled discharge conditions. It concludes with the final adopted design dimensions, specifying a stilling basin depth of 2.0m, a total length of 30.0m, and additional downstream protection consisting of a 20m concrete anti-erosion plate and 30m of masonry floor protection.

structure.title: 5.7.4.4 闸门控制运用方式拟定
structure.text:
# 5.7.4.4 闸门控制运用方式拟定  

(1)水库调度运行方式:  

合河水利枢纽控泄流量为 $850\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ ,当入库流量大于控泄流量时按控泄流量下泄,水库水位上升,直到达到 20 年一遇防洪高水位 $77.1\mathsf{m}$ ;水库水位高于 20年一遇防洪高水位时,当入库流量小于控泄流量 $2470\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 时,水库按入库流量和相应水位最大泄流能力小者下泄,当入库流量大于控泄流量 $2470\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 时按控泄流量下泄,直到达到 100 年一遇防洪高水位 $77.5\mathsf{m}$ ;水库水位高于 100 年一遇防洪高水位时,26 孔泄洪闸闸门由中间孔向两侧对称开启,全部打开,当入库流量大于相应的最大泄流能力时,水库水位上涨,水库滞洪;退水时段,入库洪水流量减小后敞泄,使库水位回落到汛限水位。  

(2)闸门运行方式拟定:  

上游正常蓄水位 73.00m 时,采用 26 孔全开。  

水位从 $73.00\mathrm{m}$ 上涨至 77.10m 时,闸门全开孔数从 26 孔关闭至 6 孔,实现控泄 $850\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 。  

上游水位 77.10m 时,采用 5 孔全开,其中 1 孔调整闸门开度的方式控泄$850\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 。  

水位从 77.10m 上涨至 $77.50\mathrm{m}$ 时,闸门全开孔数从 5 孔打开至 14 孔,其中 1 孔调整闸门开度的方式实现控泄 $2470\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ 。  

当上游水位大于设计洪水位 $77.50\mathrm{m}$ 时,闸门从全开 14 孔至 26 孔全部打开,洪水自由下泄,水位上涨。  

以上闸门运行方式需根据实际下游水位情况及过闸流量动态调整。
structure.summary:
The partial document outlines the gate control and operation modes for the Hehe Water Conservancy Hub. Its main points include:

1.  **Reservoir Dispatching Rules:** It defines specific discharge control targets ($850\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$ and $2470\mathrm{m}^{3}/\mathsf{s}$) based on different flood return periods (20-year and 100-year) and water level thresholds ($77.1\mathsf{m}$ and $77.5\mathsf{m}$).
2.  **Gate Operation Sequences:** It details the specific number of gates (out of 26) to be opened, closed, or adjusted as the upstream water level rises from the normal pool level ($73.00\mathsf{m}$) to flood levels.
3.  **Emergency and Recession Handling:** It specifies that all 26 gates must be opened for free discharge when the water level exceeds the 100-year design flood level ($77.5\mathsf{m}$) and describes how gates are managed during the flood recession phase to return to the flood limit level.
4.  **Dynamic Adjustment:** It notes that gate operations must be dynamically adjusted based on actual downstream water levels and real-time flow conditions.

structure.title: 5.7.4.5 出水渠水力计算
structure.summary:
This document segment outlines the hydraulic calculation methods and safety standards for an outlet channel. Its main points include:

1. **Hydraulic Calculation Method**: It specifies the use of the uniform flow formula for open channels (Chezy's formula) to determine the design flow, defining key variables such as cross-sectional area, hydraulic radius, slope, and the roughness coefficient.
2. **Safety Freeboard and Classification**: It details the determination of the channel's safety height based on the GB50288-2018 standard. For channels with a flow rate exceeding $500\text{ m}^3/\text{s}$, the structure is classified as Grade 1, and the safety freeboard is specifically set at $1.5\text{ m}$ in accordance with earth-rock dam design requirements.

structure.title: 5.7.5 防渗排水设计
structure.text: # 5.7.5 防渗排水设计
structure.summary: # 5.7.5 防渗排水设计

structure.title: 5.7.5.1 防渗排水布置
structure.text:
# 5.7.5.1 防渗排水布置  

根据地质章节的描述,闸基底部为粉细砂层,粉细砂呈中密\~密实状,具中等\~强透水性。水库蓄水后,在闸基两侧水头压力差作用下,易发生渗漏和渗透变形破坏,存在闸基渗漏及渗透稳定问题。  

闸室上游设置 1.5m 深的齿墙,齿墙底高程 $67.50\mathrm{m}$ ,下接 8.5m 深、 $0.6\mathsf{m}$ 厚水泥土搅拌桩围封,围封墙底高程 $59.00\mathrm{m}$ 。墙底伸入相对不透水层(第 $\textcircled{6}$ 层重粉质壤土层)内 $1\mathsf{m}$ ,防渗墙与闸室底板相接处采用 60#沥青充填。  

根据地勘报告,泄洪闸钻孔承压水观测,承压水位 $68.20{\sim}71.53\mathrm{m}$ ,承压水位与潜水位相当。消力池基础所在地层为第 $\textcircled{4}$ 层粉细砂,为承压水层。因此,在消力池处设置排水孔和排水反滤层设施。排水孔采用 $\$100m m P V C$ 管,呈梅花形布置,孔距 $2.0\times2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,排水孔内埋设级配碎石柱,消力池下铺设级配碎石垫层 200mm 及中粗砂 200mm。
structure.summary:
该文档片段主要描述了闸基的防渗排水布置方案。其核心内容包括：
1. **地质风险分析**：指出闸基位于具中等至强透水性的粉细砂层，存在渗漏及渗透变形破坏的风险。
2. **防渗设计方案**：详细说明了在闸室上游设置1.5m深的齿墙，并连接8.5m深的水泥土搅拌桩围封墙，墙底深入相对不透水层1m，且防渗墙与底板连接处采用沥青充填。
3. **排水反滤布置**：针对消力池基础的承压水问题，设计了呈梅花形布置的PVC排水孔，孔内埋设级配碎石柱，并在消力池下方铺设级配碎石和中粗砂垫层作为反滤设施。

structure.title: 5.7.5.2 闸基防渗长度的确定
structure.text:
# 5.7.5.2 闸基防渗长度的确定  

采用渗径系数法进行拟定,初拟闸基防渗长度可采用渗径系数法,即闸基地下轮廓线长度应不小于地基允许渗径系数与上下游水位差之积。  

$$
L\geq C\Delta H
$$  

式中:  

$L$ 闸基防渗长度(m); $C$ 渗径系数,取 $C=5$ ; $\Delta H$ —计算水头(m),  

本工程地下轮廓设计采用防洪高水位工况,此工况上下游水位差最大。上游防洪高水位 $77.10\mathrm{m}$ ,下游无水时 $\Delta H{=}6.30\mathsf{m}$ ,此时初拟闸基防渗长度 $\mathsf{L}{=}31.5\mathsf{m}$ 。  

泄洪闸水平防渗总长为 $39\mathsf{m}$ ,其中闸底板长 $19.0\mathrm{m}$ ,上游混凝土护坦长$20.0\mathsf{m}$ 。防渗长度满足要求。  

液化围封处理,兼顾垂直防渗功能,采用水泥土搅拌桩围封墙,墙底伸入相对不透水层(第 $\textcircled{6}$ 层重粉质壤土层)内 1m,防渗墙底高程 $59.00\mathrm{m}$ 。
structure.summary: This document section outlines the determination and verification of the anti-seepage length for a sluice foundation. It specifies the use of the seepage path coefficient method ($L \geq C\Delta H$) to calculate the required length, using a coefficient of $5$ and a maximum head difference of $6.30\mathrm{m}$ under flood conditions. The text confirms that the actual designed horizontal anti-seepage length of $39\mathrm{m}$ meets the calculated requirement of $31.5\mathrm{m}$. Additionally, it describes the implementation of vertical anti-seepage measures using cement soil mixing piles for liquefaction treatment, including the specific depth and geological layer requirements for the wall.

structure.title: 5.7.5.3 防渗、排水设计
structure.text:
# 5.7.5.3 防渗、排水设计  

泄洪闸闸室闸底板长 $19.0\mathrm{m}$ ,厚 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,底板上游侧设置 $1.5\mathrm{m}$ 深的齿墙与$8.5\mathsf{m}$ 深、 $0.6\mathsf{m}$ 厚水泥土搅拌桩围封墙;泄洪闸闸室上游设 $20.0\mathsf{m}$ 长混凝土铺盖,厚 $1.0\mathsf{m}$ ,底部铺设 $0.1\mathsf{m}$ 厚 C20 混凝土垫层。闸室下游接下挖式消力池,池深 $2.0\mathsf{m}$ ,底高程 $68.80\mathrm{m}$ ,底板厚 $1.6\mathrm{m}$ ,消力池池长 $30\mathrm{m}$ ,其中斜坡段 $8\mathsf{m}$ ,坡度 1:4,挖深段 $^{22\mathrm{{m}}}$ 。消力池处设置排水孔和排水反滤层设施。排水孔采用 $\Phi$ 100mmPVC 管,呈梅花形布置,孔距 $2.0\times2.0\mathsf{m}$ 。闸室上下游连接段挡墙设排水孔,采用 $\Phi70\mathsf{m m P V C}$ 管。
structure.summary: 该文档片段主要描述了泄洪闸的防渗与排水设计方案，涵盖了闸室底板的尺寸及其配套的防渗设施（齿墙与水泥土搅拌桩围封墙）、上游混凝土铺盖的构造规格、下游下挖式消力池的几何尺寸与结构设计，以及消力池和连接段挡墙的排水孔布置与反滤设施的具体参数。

structure.title: 5.7.6 闸室稳定计算
structure.text: # 5.7.6 闸室稳定计算
structure.summary: # 5.7.6 闸室稳定计算

structure.title: 5.7.6.1 计算工况及荷载组合
structure.text:
# 5.7.6.1 计算工况及荷载组合 由《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)对闸室稳定计算的相关要求,该部分应力稳定设计选取两相邻顺水流向永久缝之间的闸段作为计算单元,分析其受力情况。计算工况及荷载组合见表 5.7.6-1。 表 5.7.6-1 闸室稳定计算工况及荷载组合表

structure.summary: 该文档片段主要介绍了水闸闸室稳定计算的准则与参数配置。其核心内容包括：1. 明确了计算依据为《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)；2. 规定了以相邻顺水流向永久缝之间的闸段作为应力稳定计算单元；3. 详细列出了计算工况及其对应的荷载组合，涵盖了“基本组合”（完建情况、最高挡水位情况）和“特殊组合”（检修情况、校核洪水位情况、地震情况），并指明了各工况下需考虑的自重、水重、压力及地震等各项荷载因素。

structure.title: 5.7.6.2 闸室稳定计算
structure.text:
# 5.7.6.2 闸室稳定计算  

(1)闸室基底应力  

根据《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)对闸室稳定计算的相关要求,闸室基底应力应根据结构布置和受力情况计算,本设计中,结构布置和受力情况对称,因此基底应力按下式计算:  

$$
P_{m i n}^{m a x}=\frac{\sum G}{A}\pm\frac{\sum M}{W}
$$  

式中:  

$P_{m i n}^{m a x}$ 闸室基底应力的最大值或最小值(kPa);  

$\sum G$ 作用在闸室上的全部竖向荷载(kN);  

$\sum M$ ——作用在闸室上的全部竖向和水平向荷载对于基础底面垂直水流方向的形心轴的力矩 $(k N\cdot m)$ ;  

A— 闸室基底面的面积 $(\mathsf{m}^{2})$ ;  

W——闸室基底面对于该底面垂直水流方向的形心轴的截面矩 $(\mathsf m^{3})$ 。  

由《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)对闸室稳定计算的相关要求,闸室地基应力在各种计算情况下,闸室平均应力不大于地基允许承载力,最大基底应力不大于地基允许承载力的 1.2 倍,即如下公式:  

$$
\bar{P}=\frac{P_{m a x}+P_{m i n}}{2}\leq[R]
$$  

$$
P_{m a x}\leq1.2[R]
$$  

闸室基底应力的最大值与最小值之比应不大于《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)中表 7.3.5 规定的允许值 $[\eta]$ 。
structure.summary: The document outlines the calculation methods and stability requirements for sluice chamber base stress, citing the "Design Code for Sluices" (SL265-2016). It provides the mathematical formulas for determining maximum, minimum, and average base pressure based on vertical loads, moments, and base geometry. Additionally, it specifies the safety criteria for ground pressure, including limits for average stress, maximum stress relative to soil bearing capacity, and the allowable ratio between maximum and minimum stress.

structure.title: (2)闸室抗滑稳定计算
structure.text:
# (2)闸室抗滑稳定计算 根据《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)对闸室稳定计算的相关要求,闸室稳定除了要满足以上闸室基底压力的要求,还需要满足抗滑稳定要求。沿闸室基底面的抗滑稳定安全系数应不小于表 7.3.13 规定的允许值,抗浮稳定满足 7.3.16 的相关规定。 闸室抗滑稳定计算根据《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)7.3.6节规定,黏性土地基上的大型水闸,沿闸室基底面的抗滑稳定安全系数按下式计算: $$ K_{c}=\frac{t a n\varphi_{0}\sum G+C_{0}A}{\sum H} $$ 式中: Kc— 沿闸室基底面的抗滑稳定安全系数; $\varphi_{0}$ — 闸室基础底面与土质地基之间的摩擦角,(°); $C_{0}$ — 闸室基础底面与土质地基之间的黏结力,(kPa); ∑H ——作用在闸室上的全部水平向荷载(kN)。 (3)闸室抗浮稳定计算 闸室抗浮稳定计算根据《水闸设计规范》(SL265-2016)的相关要求,按下式计算: $$ K_{f}={\frac{\sum V}{\sum U}} $$ 式中: Kf 闸室抗浮稳定安全系数; ∑V——作用在闸室上全部向下的铅直力之和(kN);∑U ——作用在闸室基底面上的扬压力(kN)。 闸室稳定计算结果见下表: 表 5.7.6-2 泄洪闸闸室稳定计算结果表
