structure.summary: This partial document provides a detailed list of the main engineering quantities for a water supply and drainage project, presented in Table 5.13.4-1. The data is categorized into two main sections: the Urban Area Management Zone and the Reservoir Management Station. For both areas, the document specifies the types, specifications, and quantities of essential infrastructure and equipment, including glass fiber reinforced plastic (FRP) septic tanks, stainless steel water tanks, UV disinfection units, variable frequency pump groups, and various utility wells (inspection and valve wells). It also lists specific items such as outdoor fire hydrants for the urban zone and specialized equipment like submersible pumps and hydrocyclone desanders for the reservoir station.

structure.title: 5.13.5 电气设计
structure.text:
# 5.13.5 电气设计  

(1)设计范围  

本工程电气专业设计范围为合河水利枢纽工程管理中心下设的职能科室管理区(城区管理区)和水库管理站管理区(坝后管理区)的电气系统。拟设置的建筑电气系统包括两个管理区的供配电系统、室外照明系统、室外监控系统,管理区内建筑物的配电系统、照明系统、防雷系统、接地系统、通讯系统、安防系统、火灾自动报警系统。
structure.summary:
# 5.13.5 电气设计  

(1)设计范围  

本工程电气专业设计范围为合河水利枢纽工程管理中心下设的职能科室管理区(城区管理区)和水库管理站管理区(坝后管理区)的电气系统。拟设置的建筑电气系统包括两个管理区的供配电系统、室外照明系统、室外监控系统,管理区内建筑物的配电系统、照明系统、防雷系统、接地系统、通讯系统、安防系统、火灾自动报警系统。

structure.title: (2)供配电系统
structure.text:
# (2)供配电系统 1)合河水利枢纽工程管理中心下设的职能科室管理区(城区管理区) 城区管理区通讯及安防监控设备为二级负荷;其他用电负荷为三级负荷。管理区室外设置一座 $10/0.4\mathsf{k V}$ 箱式变电站,供电电源引自市政电网。根据相关专业提供的设计资料,采用单位面积功率法进行负荷计算,如下表所示: 表 5.13.5-1 城区管理区负荷计算表
序号建筑单体建筑面积 (m2)负荷密度 (W/m2)计算负荷 (kW)备注
1综合楼7708083.6含厨房（不进燃气）预 留 20kW，给水泵房水 泵2kW
2警卫室3015
3柴发机房505
4仓库2009
５室外照明5
9安防用电10
7通信电源5
8管理区电动伸 缩门、车行道 闸3
合计850132.6
配电变压器的长期工作负载率按不大于 $85\%$ 计算,管理区变压器容量计算如下: $$ S_{1}~=~{\frac{P_{1}}{\cos\phi\eta}}~=~{\frac{132.6\mathrm{kW}}{0.9\times0.85}}~=~173.3\mathrm{kVA} $$ 城区管理区变压器容量为 $200\mathsf{k V}\mathsf{A}$ ,区内各用电负荷均引自变压器低压侧,电源电压为 $220/380\vee$ ;通讯及安防监控设备为双回路供电,分别引自室外箱式变电站低压侧专用回路和备用柴油发电机组,末端设置自动切换装置;管理区内设置自启动柴油发电机组做管理区备用电源,考虑带管理区所有用电负荷,发电机额定输出功率为 200kW,电压 220/380V。火灾自动报警系统、应急照明要求自带蓄电池作为备用电源,安防设备配置 UPS 作为备用电源。 管理区各建筑物内设总进线柜,建筑单体内采用树干式和放射式相结合的供电方式。消防用电设备采用专用的供电回路,当建筑内的生产、生活用电被切断时,应仍能保证消防用电。非消防负荷的配电回路设过载长延时和短路瞬时脱扣保护,消防负荷的配电线路设过载报警(不脱扣)和短路瞬时脱扣保护,插座配电回路、室外照明配电回路以及安装高度在 2.5 米以下的室内灯具配电回路均设置漏电保护开关,确保设备及人身安全。
structure.summary:
The partial document outlines the design and technical specifications for the power supply and distribution system of the Urban Management Area within the Hehe Water Conservancy Hub Project Management Center. Key points include:

*   **Load Classification and Calculation:** It defines the electrical load levels (Level 2 for security and communication, Level 3 for others) and provides a detailed load calculation table for buildings and facilities, totaling 132.6kW.
*   **Substation and Transformer Configuration:** It specifies the use of a 10/0.4kV box-type substation with a 200kVA transformer, drawing power from the municipal grid.
*   **Backup Power Systems:** The plan includes a 200kW self-starting diesel generator to cover the entire area's load, dual-circuit power supplies for critical equipment, and dedicated backup power sources such as UPS and batteries for security and fire systems.
*   **Distribution and Safety Measures:** It describes the distribution methods (tree-type and radial), the provision of dedicated circuits for fire protection equipment, and various safety protection mechanisms, including overload, short-circuit, and leakage protection to ensure equipment and personal safety.

structure.title: 2)水库管理站管理区(坝后管理区)

9管理区电动伸 缩门、车行道 闸3
合计180.15
配电变压器的长期工作负载率按不大于 $85\%$ 计算,管理区变压器容量计算如下: $$ S_{1}~=~{\frac{P_{1}}{\cos\phi\eta}}~=~{\frac{180.~15\mathrm{kW}}{0.~9\times0.85}}~=~235.~49\mathrm{kVA} $$ 坝后管理区变压器容量为 $250\mathsf{k V}\mathsf{A}$ ,区内各用电负荷均引自变压器低压侧,电源电压为 $220/380\vee$ ;通讯及安防监控设备、消防泵房为双回路供电,分别引自室外箱式变电站低压侧专用回路和备用柴油发电机组,末端设置自动切换装置;管理区内设置自启动柴油发电机组做管理区备用电源,考虑带管理区所有用电负荷,发电机额定输出功率为 250kW,电压 220/380V。火灾自动报警系统、应急照明要求自带蓄电池作为备用电源,安防设备配置 UPS 作为备用电源。 管理区各建筑物内设总进线柜,建筑单体内采用树干式和放射式相结合的供电方式。消防用电设备采用专用的供电回路,当建筑内的生产、生活用电被切断时,应仍能保证消防用电。非消防负荷的配电回路设过载长延时和短路瞬时脱扣保护,消防负荷的配电线路设过载报警(不脱扣)和短路瞬时脱扣保护,插座配电回路、室外照明配电回路以及安装高度在 2.5 米以下的室内灯具配电回路均设置漏电保护开关,确保设备及人身安全。
structure.summary:
This document segment outlines the electrical power supply and distribution design for the Dam-Rear Management Area of a water reservoir. Key points covered include:

*   **Load Classification and Calculation:** It classifies electrical loads into Grade II (security, communication, and fire pumps) and Grade III (others) and provides a detailed load calculation table totaling 180.15 kW.
*   **Power Infrastructure:** It specifies the installation of a 10/0.4kV box-type substation supplied by the municipal grid and details the selection of a 250kVA transformer.
*   **Backup Power Systems:** It describes a comprehensive emergency power strategy featuring a 250kW self-starting diesel generator to cover all loads, dual-circuit power for critical equipment, and UPS or battery backups for security and fire systems.
*   **Distribution and Safety Measures:** It defines the distribution methods (tree and radial systems), ensures dedicated power circuits for firefighting, and outlines protective measures including overload, short-circuit, and leakage protection to ensure personnel and equipment safety.

structure.title: (3)照明系统
structure.text:
# (3)照明系统  

两个管理区的照明灯具均采用节能型 LED 灯具,照度及功率密度值依据《建筑节能与可再生能源利用通用规范》GB55015-2021 第 3.3.7 节的相关规定进行设计。灯具采用分区分组控制,潮湿场所采用防潮型灯具。  

室外照明采用 LED 庭院灯,设计照度:10lx。室外照明控制箱设于警卫室内,分区分组控制,设时间控制器。  

建筑物应急照明系统见消防章节。  

(4)防雷及接地系统  

两个管理区的建筑物均按三类防雷建筑物设防,屋顶设接闪带保护。  

建筑物采用 TN-C-S 接地系统,利用结构基础钢筋做接地体,采用联合接地方式,接地电阻小于 1 欧姆,并做总等电位连接。  

室外庭院灯采用 TT 接地系统,接地电阻小于 4 欧姆。
structure.summary:
This partial document outlines the technical specifications for the lighting and lightning protection/grounding systems of two management areas. Key points include:

1.  **Lighting System:** The use of energy-saving LED fixtures designed according to GB55015-2021 standards, featuring zoned controls and moisture-proof designs for damp areas. It also specifies outdoor garden lighting requirements and refers emergency lighting to the fire safety section.
2.  **Lightning Protection:** Buildings are classified as third-class lightning protection structures, utilizing roof-mounted lightning strips.
3.  **Grounding Systems:** Detailed requirements for a TN-C-S grounding system for buildings (with resistance < 1 ohm and equipotential bonding) and a TT grounding system for outdoor garden lights (with resistance < 4 ohms), both utilizing structural foundation reinforcement for grounding.

structure.title: (5)弱电系统
structure.text:
# (5)弱电系统  

两个管理区分别在各自的综合楼内设弱电间,综合楼、警卫室设电话系统、计算机网络系统。
structure.summary:
# (5)弱电系统  

两个管理区分别在各自的综合楼内设弱电间,综合楼、警卫室设电话系统、计算机网络系统。

structure.title: (6)安防系统
structure.text:
# (6)安防系统  

两个管理区的安防系统主要包括视频安防监控系统和出入口控制系统。室外、综合楼设置视频安防监控系统,综合楼设置门禁系统,并与火灾报警系统联动。安防系统主机设于警卫室。
structure.summary:
# (6)安防系统  

两个管理区的安防系统主要包括视频安防监控系统和出入口控制系统。室外、综合楼设置视频安防监控系统,综合楼设置门禁系统,并与火灾报警系统联动。安防系统主机设于警卫室。

structure.title: (7)火灾自动报警系统
structure.text:
# (7)火灾自动报警系统  

两个管理区的综合楼分别设置一套火灾自动报警系统,系统采用区域报警系  

统。每个管理区的区域报警控制器设置于各自警卫室内。  

综合楼内消防设备由火灾探测器、手动火灾报警按钮、火灾声光警报器、指示楼层的区域显示器及火灾报警控制器等组成。  

(8)电气主要工程量

structure.summary: This partial document outlines the main civil engineering quantities for the Henan Xinxiang Hehe Water Conservancy Project. It details the specific construction volumes and material requirements across five key areas: the perimeter dam (covering earthwork, dam crest engineering, slope protection, and drainage); the spillway sluice (including excavation, structural concrete, and anti-seepage walls); fish passage facilities (detailing the fishway and gate chamber); the Baiquan River west branch inlet channel; and various ecological discharge facilities for the Huangshui River, Dasha River, and the west branch of the Baiquan River. The tables provide precise measurements for earthwork excavation and filling, concrete grades, reinforcement steel, and specialized components like pipes and drainage systems.
